title: Adrenaline Doctor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give a player a shot of adrenaline (3 use).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player that you have given an adrenaline shot to would die at night, they will automatically inject themselves with their adrenaline shot. They will die the following night instead of the night they were killed. They will not be able to perform their night ability on the night they die. Their killer will be told that their defense was too strong to kill.
- Players will not be notified that they have received an adrenaline shot, but they will be notified when they inject themselves with the shot.
- You will automatically inject yourself if you are attacked.

desc:
Post 620
*It's amazing what adrenaline does to the human body. Let's exploit it.*
